sys_ui_page.description: UI Page to administrate 'DevOps+' user role
sys_ui_page.html:
const [selectedUsers, unavailableUsers] = (function () { const userRoleGr = new GlideRecordSecure('sys_user_has_role'); userRoleGr.addQuery('role.name', 'x_424426_devops.devops_user'); userRoleGr.query(); const selected = []; const unavailable = []; while (userRoleGr.next()) { const label = userRoleGr.getDisplayValue('user'); if (label) { const userSysID = userRoleGr.getValue('user'); unavailable.push(userSysID); if (!userRoleGr.inherited) { // only show the directly assigned (not-inherited) roles on the right side of the slushbucket selected.push({ value: userSysID, label: label }); } } } return [selected, unavailable]; })(); const availableUsers = (function (unavailable) { const userRoleGr = new GlideRecordSecure('sys_user_has_role'); userRoleGr.addQuery('role.name', 'admin'); userRoleGr.addQuery('user', 'NOT IN', unavailable); userRoleGr.query(); const adminUsers = []; while (userRoleGr.next()) { const label = userRoleGr.getDisplayValue('user') if (label) { adminUsers.push({ value: userRoleGr.getValue('user'), label: label }); } } return adminUsers; })(unavailableUsers);
